comments: Kuzma (WAS) places a resting hand to Hield's (IND) side and slides his hand off as he cleanly blocks Hield's driving shot attempt.
As Smith (IND) jumps to contest the pass, marginal contact occurs with Avdija (WAS) after he has released the pass.
Caldwell-Pope (WAS) brings his hand towards Brogdon's (IND) front and brushes his arm as Brogdon passes the ball.
Smith (IND) is already in Smith's (WAS) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Caldwell-Pope (WAS) steps forward into Brogdon's (IND) path and initiates contact that affects his shot attempt.
Smith (IND) places his forearm to Avdija's (WAS) side during his drive to the basket and the contact is marginal.
Porzingis (WAS) is already in Hield's (IND) path and does not deliver contact as the defenders switch.
Brissett (IND) cleanly blocks Avdija's (WAS) shot near the rim.  Any ensuing body and arm contact after the ball is dislodged is considered marginal.
After the shot is cleanly blocked by Brissett (IND), Avdija (WAS) extends his arm backwards and initiates contact to Smith's (IND) neck that dislodges him from his position.
Brissett (IND) brings his forearm towards Porzingis (WAS) and marginal contact occurs during the shot near the rim.
Brogdon (IND) extends his arm into Caldwell-Pope's (WAS) upper body and initiates contact that dislodges Caldwell-Pope from his legally obtained defensive position.
Smith (IND) places his hand momentarily on Porzingis' (WAS) upper half before immediately removing as they disengage.
Hield (IND) places his hand momentarily on Porzingis' (WAS) side before he removes his hand.
Smith (WAS) is bracing for the contact from Smith (IND) and releases away from the contact.
Smith (IND) is already in Smith's (WAS) path and is firming up when contact occurs.
After gaining control of the ball, Hield (IND) establishes his right foot as his pivot foot, which he lifts before releasing his dribble.
Avdija (WAS) places his arm to Hield's (IND) side at the start of his drive and the contact is marginal.
Caldwell-Pope (WAS) is retreating away from Hield (IND) when marginal lower body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Brissett (IND) commits a take foul on Caldwell-Pope (IND).
Brissett (IND) commits a take foul on Caldwell-Pope (WAS).
Smith (IND) is already in Kuzma's (WAS) path and he absorbs the marginal contact to his side.
Gill (WAS) and Smith (WAS) briefly engage and disengage during rebounding.
Hield (IND) commits a take foul on Avdija (WAS).
Smith (IND) establishes himself in a screening position in Avdija's (WAS) path and absorbs the contact as he is firming up.
Kuzma (WAS) is moving alongside Hield's (IND) path and cleanly blocks the driving shot attempt.  Any ensuing arm/hand contact after the shot is blocked is considered incidental.
Brogdon (IND) commits a take foul on Caldwell-Pope (WAS).
Smith (IND) is already in Kuzma's (WAS) path and absorbs the marginal contact to his slightly extended forearm.
